props.name: content
props.description: The content to display in the popover
props.usage: Keep concise - use for short explanatory text or help information

props.name: position
props.description: Preferred position of the popover relative to trigger
props.usage: auto adjusts based on available space, specific positions for consistent placement

props.name: trigger
props.usage: hover for help text, click for more persistent content, focus for form help

props.name: maxWidth
props.description: Maximum width of the popover content
props.usage: Adjust based on content length and available space

props.name: offset
props.description: Distance in pixels between popover and trigger
props.usage: Increase for better visual separation, decrease for tighter layouts

props.name: arrow
props.description: Whether to show pointing arrow to trigger element
props.usage: Helps visually connect popover to its trigger

props.name: delay
props.description: Delay in milliseconds before showing popover on hover
props.usage: Prevents accidental triggers during mouse movement

react.title: Form Field Help
react.code:
function RegistrationForm() {
  return (
    <GoabContainer title="User Registration">
      <GoabFormItem label="Social Insurance Number">
        <GoabBlock direction="row" gap="s" alignment="center">
          <GoabInput 
            name="sin" 
            placeholder="000-000-000" 
            width="200px" 
          />
          <GoabPopover
            content="Your SIN is used to verify your identity and eligibility for services. It will be kept confidential and secure."
            position="right"
            trigger="hover"
            maxWidth="250px"
          >
            <GoabIconButton 
              icon="help-circle" 
              variant="tertiary" 
              size="small"
              ariaLabel="Help for SIN field" 
            />
          </GoabPopover>
        </GoabBlock>
      </GoabFormItem>
      
      <GoabFormItem label="Income Range">
        <GoabBlock direction="row" gap="s" alignment="center">
          <GoabDropdown name="income" width="200px">
            <option value="">Select range</option>
            <option value="0-25000">$0 - $25,000</option>
            <option value="25000-50000">$25,000 - $50,000</option>
            <option value="50000+">$50,000+</option>
          </GoabDropdown>
          <GoabPopover
            content="Select your household's total annual income before taxes. This helps determine your eligibility for programs."
            position="right"
            trigger="click"
          >
            <GoabIconButton 
              icon="information-circle" 
              variant="tertiary" 
              size="small"
              ariaLabel="Income range help" 
            />
          </GoabPopover>
        </GoabBlock>
      </GoabFormItem>
    </GoabContainer>
  );
}

react.title: Feature Explanations
react.code:
function ServiceFeatures() {
  return (
    <GoabContainer title="Available Services">
      <GoabList type="unordered" variant="spaced">
        <GoabListItem>
          <GoabBlock direction="row" gap="s" alignment="center">
            <GoabText>Priority Processing</GoabText>
            <GoabPopover
              content="Priority processing reduces wait times for urgent cases such as medical emergencies or imminent eviction notices."
              position="right"
              trigger="hover"
            >
              <GoabIconButton 
                icon="help" 
                variant="tertiary" 
                size="small"
                ariaLabel="Priority processing explanation" 
              />
            </GoabPopover>
          </GoabBlock>
        </GoabListItem>
        
        <GoabListItem>
          <GoabBlock direction="row" gap="s" alignment="center">
            <GoabText>Digital Document Vault</GoabText>
            <GoabPopover
              content="Securely store and access your important documents online. Documents are encrypted and backed up for your security."
              position="right"
              trigger="click"
              maxWidth="280px"
            >
              <GoabIconButton 
                icon="help" 
                variant="tertiary" 
                size="small"
                ariaLabel="Document vault explanation" 
              />
            </GoabPopover>
          </GoabBlock>
        </GoabListItem>
      </GoabList>
    </GoabContainer>
  );
}

whenToUse: Providing contextual help for form fields
Offering additional details without cluttering the interface
Help text that doesn't warrant a full help section
whenNotToUse: Essential information that users must see (use main content instead)
Long explanations (use Details component or separate help pages)
bestPractices: Keep content concise - aim for 1-2 sentences maximum
Use clear, plain language avoiding technical jargon
Position popovers to avoid blocking important content
Use consistent trigger types within the same context
Ensure popover triggers are clearly identifiable
Test positioning across different screen sizes
Provide adequate color contrast for readability
accessibility: Ensure popover triggers are keyboard accessible
Use proper ARIA labels on trigger elements
Test with screen readers for proper announcement
Provide alternative access to popover content when needed
Ensure focus management when using click triggers
Use adequate color contrast for popover content

commonIssues.cause: Missing trigger element or invalid positioning
commonIssues.solution: Ensure popover wraps a valid trigger element and check position constraints
Use position='auto' or adjust maxWidth to fit available space
Adjust position prop or reduce content length

commonIssues.issue: Touch devices not showing hover popover
commonIssues.cause: Hover events don't work consistently on touch devices
commonIssues.solution: Use click trigger for mobile-friendly interactions
